text:
On 12/14/2024 at 01:12 PM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/14/2024 at 01:17 PM)
Subject:Adrian
I saw his tummy started to hurt. Poor guy. We will see about game tomorrow night.
I’ll work on some calendar system for him at house.
Message 151 of 287
I asked if I could coordinate with you based on the plans for the Nutcracker. He is sound asleep. If you are going to pass, I would have him just
continue to sleep. If you are going to insist on going anyway, I’d make him sleep take up sooner and send him home. It’s a simple discussion that
would take 30 seconds if you wanted to do this right instead of swapping 20 OFW emails and then forking with Alan through texts that don’t have
the info required to make the determination.
Yesterday was largely the same. Kari asked again if she could do Sunday. I asked to plan so perhaps he started later to salvage the day. You refused to
answer Kari or even acknowledge the question. I asked for a 30 second conversation. You just went dark with four people waiting on you to check in
and when you did you did not have all the facts. Something I could have clarified easily.
I’m sorry that you feel like this is abusive. That reminds me of your accusations at Children’s hospital. I don’t know how to crack the nut with you,
Christine.
If you won’t give me any information to optimize for his health vs. your night’s plans, I’ll make the decision myself. I was just trying to help you both
out.
Sent:12/14/2024 at 03:28 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Subject:Re: Adrian
On 12/14/2024 at 03:12 PM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/14/2024 at 03:14 PM)
Subject:Re: Adrian
Question for what? Alan asked if he could drop off early and I said yes.
If you are asking about your sarcastic comments... they are abusive.
On 12/14/2024 at 03:02 PM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/14/2024 at 03:09 PM)
Subject:Re: Adrian
You did not answer my question.
On 12/14/2024 at 03:01 PM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/14/2024 at 03:01 PM)
Subject:Re: Adrian
I was in my therapy session. I saw Alan’s text.
